name: RI_1_1_19_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Merge_Event
title: RI.1.1.19.1 Evidence of Record Entry Merge Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Merge Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Merge Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.19.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when Record Entries are merged (e.g., same patient, multiple sets of record entries).

statement.label: RI.1.1.19.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization where Record Entries are merged.

statement.label: RI.1.1.19.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of merged Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.19.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the identifier for the source set of Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.19.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the identifier for the target set of Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.19.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the user merging Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.19.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which merged Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.19.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., merge).

statement.label: RI.1.1.19.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entries are merged.

statement.label: RI.1.1.19.1#10
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entries are merged.

statement.label: RI.1.1.19.1#11
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for merging Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.19.1#12
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the data, document or other identifier for merged Record Entries.
